result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Bent was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
4 ay(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
Deft is ordered to provide a DNA specimen.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Bent

records.addlTxt: Per RCSO, DNA collected - 10-05-2015 at 09:15 am

Defendant Michael J Bent in court with attorney Jerry T. Delcore.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Plea - G.
BTC: GUILTY.
Deft is ordered to provide a DNA specimen;
$200+cc+DNA, 60 dtp, ftp 4 days RCJ for contempt.

from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in compliance with agency requirements.

Defendant Michael J Bent in court with attorney Jerry T. Delcore.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
St -  Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in violation of agency requirements.
copy of letter from State Public Defender - not eligible
Status conference on August 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 6, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Michael J Bent in court with attorney Trisha Janet Fritz.  Defendant Michael J Bent in custody.  W Richard Chiapete appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
